basic_information.scholarship_name: The Dr. William Caire Selman Living Lab Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science pursuing a degree in the Department of Biology. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Majoring in Biology Full-time Student Minimum 2.75 GPA Preference given to a student who has participated in research or service at the Selman Living Lab Two faculty references must be provided
